name: Bunny Foo Foo Smash
description:
Stop field mice from escaping to fairy god mother's house. You're only going to get three chances at this, so bop and hop around the board as long as possible!

  • Field Mice
    • Escape when the visit fairy god mother's house on the left of the board
    • Eat small cheeses
    • Eat whole cheese plates (But stay put for three turns to sleep it off)
    • Dig a hole to safety if they can flee from bunny foo foo's bops
  • Bunny Foo Foo (That's you)
    • Can let three field mice escape to fairy god mother before his chances are up
    • Bops field mice when he moves onto them
    • Cannot move onto holes
    • Can collect small cheeses to drop a tasty cheese plate

Source: https://bitbucket.org/superstructuredgames/littlebunfoox2
